docs.text: IBM Cloud Security and Compliance Center - Level 3 Demonstration Guide Welcome to the demonstration guide for the IBM Cloud Security and Compliance Center Level 3 learning plan. Before starting this learning plan, it is highly recommended that you complete the IBM Cloud Security and Compliance Center Foundation learning plan: IBMers: https://yourlearning.ibm.com/activity/PLAN-??? Business Partners: https://learn.ibm.com/course
